page.title: 18CARDROSS _ SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {COMMUNITY COUNCIL -}THIS IS THE BODY THROUGH WHICH THE VILLAGERS CAN AIR THEIR GRIEVANCES. JUDGING BY THE ATTENDANCES, HOWEVER, ONE GETS THE IMPRESSION THAT MOST PEOPLE ARE QUITE CONTENT WITH THE WAY THINGS ARE! IN FACT, MOST ARE JUST APATHETIC. PUBLIC{ TOILETS ARE BEING CAMPAIGNED FOR AND RUBBISH SKIPS HAVE BEEN REMOVED. {NUCLEAR BASES -}THESE DO NOT SEEM TO CAUSE MUCH CONCERN, TO MOST PEOPLE,AT ANY RATE, BUT THERE IS SOME DISQUIET AT THE PROSPECT OF INCREASED HEAVY TRAFFIC THROUGH THE VILLAGE WITH THE COMING OF TRIDENT TO FASLANE. {DRUG REHABILITATION CENTRE -} THIS WAS SET UP AT KILMAHEW HOUSE, FORMERLY ST. PETER'S COLLEGE, AND RUN UNDER THE AUSPICES OF THE ARCHDIOCESE OF GLASGOW. THE NEED FOR IT IS ACCEPTED,BUT THERE IS UNEASE AT ITS PROXIMITY.
